title: Request: Web Based mRemoteNG
author: clumsyzombie
body_snippet: I have been looking for something like mRemoteNG but all web based. Something I could run on a internal web server and access from any system. Do you know if this is something that can be done or is being looked into.

comments.author: kmscode
comments.snippet: We don't have any such feature on our radar at the moment.

comments.author: pedro2555
comments.snippet:
Remote Desktop Web Access.

If you want to host it, you could just leave it on a windows machine and use RDP to access it.

It is not exactly browser based, as you might expect, and requires a Windows client to work, but then is just a question of downloading the RDWA shortcut for your application, it is then run on the server and rendered on the client.

comments.author: foinus
comments.snippet:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/manage/honolulu/honolulu
Schutt do the trick for u
